content: Write me the “Conclusion” part of the article in 50 words. Include a call to action to the persona and provide this information about myself: I am a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years experience specialising in construction law. I regularly advise homeowners and builders and developers regarding their contractual and legal rights. I represent homeowners and builders and developers in NSW, VIC, and QLD, Australia as well as all courts of competent jurisdiction. I have advised homeowners, builders, and contractors and developers regarding repudiating a building contract. I have advised them on their contract rights, risks and obligations. I have negotiated and amended contracts to reflect their intentions.
